title: C.E.O. of Celsius, the Crypto Bank, Resigns
description: Alex Mashinsky, the founder of Celsius, which filed for bankruptcy in July, said his role had “become an increasing distraction.”

title: Meta Removes Chinese Effort to Influence U.S. Elections
description: The parent of Facebook and Instagram said that it had taken down what was the first targeted Chinese campaign to interfere in U.S. politics and that the effort was limited.

title: Dating Apps Thrive in China, but Not Just for Romance
description: China has cracked down on many tech companies, but has allowed dating apps that provide social connections to flourish.
